message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $90. I'm willing to compromise, though - how about we meet in the middle at $100?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob! I can do $98, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $97, but that's as high as I can go
